staxel.village.character.dialogue.MorelB: I was happy being one with the mushrooms!
Though, I suppose we couldn't be good friends if you hadn't...
That's quite an impressive tool ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; made for you...
But please don't point it at any of my mushrooms...
The only issue I have with mushrooms is the spores...
I think... I think I might be allergic...
